My Chemical Romance Gelar Show Reuni pada 20 Desember
01 Nov 2019, 11:34 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


My Chemical Romance yang telah umumkan bubar pada 2013, memutuskan untuk bereuni pada 20 Desember mendatang. (dok: www.mychemicalromance.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Rumor yang selama ini hanya didengung-dengungkan, akhirnya menjadi nyata. My Chemical Romance akan berkumpul kembali, setidaknya untuk satu konser, pada 20 Desember di Shrine Expo Hall di Los Angeles.Show mendatang akan menjadi yang pertama kalinya sejak MCR mengumumkan rehat pada 2013. Mereka sendiri mengunggah pemberitahuan tentang reuni ini lewat cuitan Twitter pada Jumat (1/11)."Like Phantoms Forever... Tiket dijual mulai Jumat 1/11/19 jam 12.00 siang," tulis MCR seraya menyertakan potongan poster reuni.



Like Phantoms, Forever adalah titel mini album debut MCR yang rilis pada 2002 silam. Mini album itu berisi tiga lagu, yakni Vampires Will Never Hurt You, This Is The Best Day Ever, dan Jack The Ripper. Penggemar mulai berspekulasi tentang reuni MCR setelah akun media sosial band pemilik lagu Helena itu tiba-tiba aktif lagi, tiga tahun silam. Saat itu, MCR merayakan satu dekade kelahiran album The Black Parade yang memang mengorbitkan Gerard Way dan kawan-kawannya ke puncak popularitas.Kemudian, musisi Joe Jonas sempat mengatakan bahwa ia mengetahui MCR sedang berlatih di studio di tempat yang sama dengan tempat latihan The Jonas Brothers. "My Chemical Romance tampaknya sedang berlatih di sebelah kami di New York baru-baru ini... padahal saya pikir mereka sudah bubar," kata Jonas pada Juni lalu.MCR telah memenuhi diskografi dengan empat album dan enam mini album. Album terakhir yang dirilis pada 2010 adalah Danger Days: The True Lives of the Fabulous Killjoys.Sejak memutuskan bubar, kelima personel MCR tampak sibuk dengan kehidupan masing-masing. Vokalis Gerard Way sempat melepas album solo bertajuk Hesitant Alien pada 2014, sebelum 'tenggelam' dalam proyek komik The Umbrella Academy yang kemudian diangkat jadi serial di Netflix.Sementara gitaris Frank Lero yang juga memilih bersolo karier telah merilis album Barriers. Kini, setelah reuni dikonfirmasi sendiri oleh My Chemical Romance, penggemar mulai berharap mereka akan kembali ke studio bersama dan menggelar tur lagi. (rea)

My Chemical Romance Holds the Reunion Show on December 20th
01 Nov 2019, 11:34 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


My Chemical Romance, which was announced to be disbanded in 2013, decided to reunite on December 20th. (doc: www.mychemicalromance.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Rumors that have only been touted for a long time have finally become real. My Chemical Romance will regroup, at least for one concert, on December 20 at the Shrine Expo Hall in Los Angeles. The upcoming show will be the first time since the MCR announced a break in 2013. They themselves posted a notification about the reunion via Twitter tweet on Friday ( "Like Phantoms Forever ... Tickets are on sale starting Friday 1/11/19 at 12.00 noon," the MCR wrote, including a reunion poster cut.



Like Phantoms, Forever is the title of MCR's debut mini album, released in 2002. The mini album contains three songs, namely Vampires Will Never Hurt You, This Is The Best Day Ever, and Jack The Ripper. Fans began to speculate about the MCR reunion after the band's social media account owner Helena song was suddenly active again, three years ago. At that time, the MCR celebrated a decade of the birth of the album The Black Parade which indeed orphaned Gerard Way and his friends to the peak of popularity. Then, musician Joe Jonas had said that he knew the MCR was practicing in the studio in the same place as the Jonas Brothers practice site . "My Chemical Romance seems to be practicing next to us in New York recently ... even though I thought they had broken up," Jonas said in June. The MCR has filled the discography with four albums and six mini albums. The last album released in 2010 was Danger Days: The True Lives of the Fabulous Killjoy. Since breaking up, the five MCR personnel seemed busy with their lives. Vocalist Gerard Way had released a solo album titled Hesitant Alien in 2014, before 'sinking' in the comic project The Umbrella Academy which was later made a series on Netflix. While guitarist Frank Lero who also chose solo career has released the album Barriers. Now, after the reunion was confirmed by My Chemical Romance, fans began hoping they would return to the studio together and tour again. (rea)
